name: Hogsmeade
description: The only entirely non-Muggle settlement in Britain
residentsOrOwners: Owners of various businesses include Aberforth Dumbledore, Madame Rosmerta and Madam Puddifoot, and shops include Honeydukes sweet shop, and Zonko’s Joke Shop
magicalProperties: Both Honeydukes and the Hog’s Head pub have secret passages into the grounds of Hogwarts
